title: The new TrainerDay Calendar - The Best way to use a Cycling Training Plan on your Garmin Device

transcript.full_text: hello today i'm going to show you how the my calendar feature of trainer day works as well as synchronizing your calendar to garmin connect hello this is alex from trainer day we help you amplify your health and cycling performance by utilizing simple evidence-based training principles so here you can see i've got a blank calendar and if i go to garmin connect you can see i don't have any planned workouts on my garmin connect and i will come into my plans and i'll find a plan that i can add so i know i've got an eight-week plan down here i'll come down i will send that plan to my calendar and i will go ahead and send it for not next week i'll send it for this week i go to my calendar now you can now see this week and next week have got a plan on them as well as the following six weeks here the interesting feature is i have also got enabled if i go to apps and devices and i come down to garmin i've connected to garmin and i've got this new feature calendar sync this will sync two weeks to garmin connect and it says only for beta users it won't say that and you will when you see this so if i come back to my calendar in garmin now and i refresh it okay so here you can see my garmin calendar now i've got from tomorrow forward i've got all of those because there's no reason to sing planned workouts to the past and it only goes forward by two weeks i'll go forward which you can only see so that was a total of two weeks there the great why would you do this you know you can already send a plan to garmin if you've ever tried to do this before you go to garmin connect if you make a mistake you send it to the wrong weeks you decide you want to change your plan you have to go into every workout and say remove from calendar in order to delete these workouts if you do that in our app and you're on our calendar you can just actually go up here to this and you can see here's my plan and you can hit the delete button this will delete the whole plan from my calendar as well as delete everything in garmin so that saves you a lot of time the other thing you can do is you can actually do special features here i'll show you on this week you can copy a week you can insert a week below so if you decide oh i need a i need a rest week next week but then i want to continue my plan you can insert a week week below you can clear a week if you just want to remove the workouts from this week and you can delete a week is which is shrinks up your calendar right so you've got all these features that will automatically sync again to garmin and these these garmin doesn't have those features so it can save you a lot of time and if you're using a coach jack plan for example you can edit your coach jack plan resend it to your calendar do all that and instead of having to go in and delete 16 weeks of workouts or have eight weeks of workouts or whatever it is you can just do that really quickly and and it gives you a great advantage so you also can come in and just click the little plus button on any day you can find a workout from our community plans you can search and first it will look in your library and then it will look you know you can also create a new workout but i'll go ahead and click on that one and then i'll just add it to that day in my calendar so there i've got it in my calendar it's on the 24th i'll actually just move it to the 25th so then if i go back to garmin and i refresh it you will see i now have that workout on my on the 25th so and then i can delete i've got i can drag up here and just delete it like that i can move anything else around i can undo that if i accidentally made a mistake and delete it thank you very much
